title: Cowpens National Battlefield: Parks as Classrooms
body: Parks as Classrooms        Curriculum Materials The NPS is committed to the nation's youngest citizens and future stewards. Excite your students with a change of scenery, and let Cowpens National Battlefield be your classroom. We have a wide array of materials to explore the battle and the Revolutionary War. A field trip to the park gives students a chance to form their own intellectual and emotional connections to our shared cultural heritage. All Curriculum Materials     Field Trips Field trips are a great chance for students to learn about the history at Cowpens National Battlefield. Please call 864-461-2828 to schedule your visit. All Field Trips
